trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.HeaderItem" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de enumeração <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.HeaderItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "GridViewColumnHeader".
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém "GridViewColumnHeader".

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke" />, this method returns a <see langword="this" /> pointer; otherwise this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> for <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke" />, esse método retorna um ponteiro <see langword="this" />; caso contrário, esse método retornará <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o elemento associado a esse par de automação contém dados que são apresentados ao usuário.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo ou membro dá suporte à infraestrutura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e não se destina a ser usado diretamente do código.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element can be moved; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o elemento pode ser movido; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element can be resized; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o elemento pode ser redimensionado; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo ou membro dá suporte à infraestrutura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e não se destina a ser usado diretamente do código.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element can rotate; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o elemento pode girar; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Absolute screen coordinates of the left side of the control.
trans-unit.target: Coordenadas da tela absolutas do lado esquerdo do controle.

trans-unit.source: Absolute screen coordinates of the top of the control.
trans-unit.target: Coordenadas da tela absolutas da parte superior do controle.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo ou membro dá suporte à infraestrutura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e não se destina a ser usado diretamente do código.

trans-unit.source: The new width of the window, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A nova largura da janela, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The new height of the window, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A nova altura da janela, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

trans-unit.source: The number of degrees to rotate the control.
trans-unit.target: O número de graus para girar o controle.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
